about_the_game:
Fungi Fantastico is a fun first person platforming adventure set in a vibrant nature filled world. Play as a kind of secluded druid who is dealing with a toxic fungal infestation in their your peaceful valley. Set off on an adventure to purge the corruption and learn some new tricks along the way.

Pop Mushrooms, and develop your movement;
A game where mushrooms on the ground can be popped with your nature beam to give you various buffs, making you move and jump higher to faster traverse the environment. Along with that, gain skills to improve your movement, double jumps, dashes and gravity control.

Colorful environments and chill lofi/ambient music await you in this game to kick back and relax with after a tough day. Escape with the Fungi, in Fungi Fantastico!!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core 17-6700K or AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 or AMD Radeon RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 15 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible Sound Card
